messages.content: Olivolingvo is a derivative of Esperanto focused on the Mediterranean. It largely strips out the non-Mediterranean components replacing them with grammar and vocabulary from Hebrew, ancient Egyptian, and Tamazight. Translate Esperanto↔Olivolingvo per tag.

<EO2OLV>
La luno brilis inter la malrapidaj nuboj.
H’Levana brilis inter h’ananim malrapidaj.

Olivolingvo is a derivative of Esperanto focused on the Mediterranean. It largely strips out the non-Mediterranean components replacing them with grammar and vocabulary from Hebrew, ancient Egyptian, and Tamazight. Translate Esperanto↔Olivolingvo per tag.
